purpose: This code appears to be collecting system information and sending it to a Discord webhook, likely for tracking or telemetry purposes.
anomalies: Sending system information to external service without user consent
Collection of potentially sensitive information like IP addresses and system details
analysis: The code collects various system and package information including internal/external IP addresses, DNS servers, hostname, user info, and package metadata. It then sends this data to a hardcoded Discord webhook URL. This represents a clear case of unauthorized data exfiltration and telemetry collection without explicit user consent. The use of external services to gather system information is typical of tracking/malware behavior.
conclusion: This code exhibits malicious behavior by collecting system information and transmitting it to an external service without user knowledge or consent.
